title: Iddah for a woman who is divorced, does not have periods, or is pregnant | Sheikh Assim Al Hakeem
transcript: so there is a idea for a woman who's divorced her EDA is one of three one generally speaking a normal woman right there would be three monthly cycles to a woman or a girl who does not have monthly cycle either because she's too young or she's too old menopause in this case her idea is three months lunar months and thirdly a woman who is pregnant her ada is to deliver once she delivers her pregnancy when she gives birth then she is out of her ada immediately
